name: All The Horses
description:
A puzzle game where you are simply trying to get to the horn.

This game was created from the idea that puzzles can be fun without being extremely complicated. There are too many puzzle games we’ve played over the years that I’ve never beat. We have terrible attention spans so mechanics can’t get too complicated. And those puzzles that take twenty minutes to figure out never leave you satisfied because the next level uses a brand new set of rules that stop you for another twenty minutes. All the Horses hopes to give you puzzles you can fly through. Each level is relatively small, so trial and error does not trip you up too much. At least that’s the hope.  

Solve puzzles!

Have others animal friends help you out!
